refnamediv.refpurpose: [DEPRECATED] Helper functions to convert between Epoch time and Mac (iPod) time

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The functions provide conversion between Epoch time and Mac (iPod) time.
refsect1.note: These functions are now obsolete and should no longer be used, libgpod automatically converts to/from Epoch time and iPod time when writing/reading the iPod databases.

refsect2.title: itdb_time_get_mac_time ()

warning.para: itdb_time_get_mac_time is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code. kept for compatibility with older code, directly use g_get_current_time() or time(NULL) instead

refsect2.para: Gets the current time in a format appropriate for storing in the libgpod data structures

refsect2.title: itdb_time_mac_to_host ()

warning.para: itdb_time_mac_to_host is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code. It's been kept for compatibility with older code, but this function is now a no-op

refsect2.para: Converts a timestamp from libgpod format to host system timestamp.

refsect2.title: itdb_time_host_to_mac ()

warning.para: itdb_time_host_to_mac is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code. It's been kept for compatibility with older code, but this function is now a no-op

refsect2.para: Convert host system timestamp to libgpod format timestamp
